thread.section_title: Palm Gallery Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The only place to stay in Rome.
thread.title_full: The only place to stay in Rome. - Review of Palm Gallery Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Betty Rae T
title: The only place to stay in Rome.
text: Our recent stay at Palm Gallery Hotel was absolutely perfect. The rooms are quiet, clean, and beautiful. The hotel is comfortable and the patio area divinely serene. The breakfast service is excellent and delicious. Above all, the staff, especially Daniel and Vincenzo, are so helpful and companionable to the guests that they truly make the stay feel more like coming home than a stay at a hotel. When people ask me where to stay in Rome, Palm Gallery Hotel will be my highest recommendation.
